mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHASU AS chasu, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, CLOSING_DATE AS closingDate, RESTART_GUBUN AS restartGubun, RESTART_DATE AS restartDate, CHANGE_ITEM_GUBUN AS changeItemGubun, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, CHECK_OPER AS checkOper, APPLY_DATE AS applyDate FROM ATMS_02001270

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHASU AS chasu, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, CLOSING_DATE AS closingDate, RESTART_GUBUN AS restartGubun, RESTART_DATE AS restartDate, CHANGE_ITEM_GUBUN AS changeItemGubun, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, CHECK_OPER AS checkOper, APPLY_DATE AS applyDate FROM ATMS_02001270 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001270 SET CHASU = #{chasu}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, CLOSING_DATE = #{closingDate}, RESTART_GUBUN = #{restartGubun}, RESTART_DATE = #{restartDate}, CHANGE_ITEM_GUBUN = #{changeItemGubun}, OPER_START_TIME = #{operStartTime}, OPER_END_TIME = #{operEndTime}, CHECK_OPER = #{checkOper}, APPLY_DATE = #{applyDate} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001270 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, CHASU, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, STEXT_GUBUN, CLOSING_DATE, RESTART_GUBUN, RESTART_DATE, CHANGE_ITEM_GUBUN, OPER_START_TIME, OPER_END_TIME, CHECK_OPER, APPLY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{chasu}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{stextGubun}, #{closingDate}, #{restartGubun}, #{restartDate}, #{changeItemGubun}, #{operStartTime}, #{operEndTime}, #{checkOper}, #{applyDate} )
